# MSVI

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of MSVI is to provide researchers and analysts with health and socioeconomic measures data originating from various public sources.

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("asmae-toumi/MSVI")
```
